abstract: The local NBC station said it regretted the timing Wednesday night, when it rebroadcast an episode that portrayed two firefighters “pinned down by gunfire while trying to help the victim of a gang shooting.”
snippet: The local NBC station said it regretted the timing Wednesday night, when it rebroadcast an episode that portrayed two firefighters “pinned down by gunfire while trying to help the victim of a gang shooting.”
lead_paragraph: 5:29 p.m. | Updated An NBC station in upstate New York expressed regret on Thursday for televising a repeat of “Chicago Fire,” a network drama about firefighters, that bore resemblances to a real-life Christmas Eve shooting there.

headline.main: ‘Chicago Fire’ Episode Hits Too Close to Home for Webster, N.Y.
